title.title: Xinxu Gaoseng Zhuan
新續高僧傳
New Collection of Biographies of Eminent Monks

titleStmt.author: Yuqian喻謙(?-1932)
titleStmt.funder: Chung-Hwa Institute of Buddhist Studies 中華佛學研究所

publicationStmt.publisher: Chung-Hwa Institute of Buddhist Studies 中華佛學研究所
publicationStmt.pubPlace: Jinshan, Taiwan 臺灣新北市金山區

availability.p: This electronic text is distributed by Chung-Hwa Institute of Buddhist Studies under a Creative Commons Attribution Share-Alike Licence.

sourceDesc.p: Text Base is the CBETA edition of the Chinese Buddhist Canon (Version 2016).

profileDesc.creation: The Xinxu Gaoseng zhuan is dated 1923 CE.

interpGrp.interp: 1. Semantically equivalent common variant characters 勅/勑, 眾/衆, 黃/黄 are not recorded. (Authority on what is a variant is the MoE variant character dictionary 教育部異體字字典). 凡教育部《異體字字典》（http://140.111.1.40/main.htm）所認定互為異體字者。如：勅／勑、眾／衆、黃／黄、鐘／鍾。

2. Characters which are commonly considered different characters, but used as semantic equivalents between the Taisho and the Qisha text: 於古文中屬互為通用（鐘=鍾，華=花，囑=屬，於=于，耶=邪，嘆=歎，謚=諡，羡=羨，歛=斂，俊=雋），或字形雖略有差異但依其文義可視為同一字者（巳=已，𡉏=圮，=紀）。

interpGrp.desc: 1. Mistakes or non-preferred readings in the Taishō edition. 大正藏錯誤者或非優先者（大正藏訛誤、義短者）
interpGrp.interp: Mistake or non-preferred reading in the Taishō main text. Such cases can generally be assumed to reflect the Jiaxing zang reading, though there could be mistakes readings that were introduced in the creation of the Taishō. In Type 1a the preferred reading is found in the Taishō apparatus. 1a makes no statement about the appearance of the text in the Qisha, but all instances where the Qisha supports the Song reading against the Taishō are considered non-preferred readings in the Taishō main text and are included in 1a. (e.g. 水/永) // 發現大正藏的錯誤或用字較為不當者。此情況假定為承襲自嘉興藏，即使並非如此。Type 1a表示大正藏校注之用字較正文適當。1a不考慮磧砂藏之用字為何，但若磧砂藏與宋版校注相符，則亦歸於此類。
Mistake or non-preferred reading in the Taishō main text that has been newly identified in our collation with the Qisha edition. (e.g. 蛟/蚊) 對校磧砂藏或宮本而新出校者

Records an apparatus entry where the alternative reading given in the Taishō apparatus should be considered a mistake or non-preferred reading, and the character in the main text of the Taishō is considered correct. 大正藏校注為錯誤、義短者

interpGrp.desc: 2. Mistakes or non-preferred readings in the Qisha edition. 磧砂藏（或宮本）錯誤者或非優先者（磧砂藏訛誤、義短者）
interpGrp.interp: Mistake or non-preferred reading in the Qisha edition that was already identified by Fan Xiangyong 范祥雍 in the apparatus to his Zhonghua shuju 中華書局 edition (Fan 1986). // 范祥雍已出校於中華書局版或逕行修改者
Mistake or non-preferred reading that has been newly identified in our collation of the Qisha with the Taishō text. 對校大正藏而新發現者

interpGrp.desc: 3. Variant characters 不同字 - 難以判斷
interpGrp.interp: Where the variant character encodes additional semantic or grammatical information (only observed in the Qisha and the Southern Hungwu edition) (禮/礼, 薦/荐, 嘆/歎？) // 語義學或文法上有差異的異體字──古今有別，今日混用者（禮/礼 此使用上的差異僅見於磧砂藏與洪武南藏。另外，「薦」作寺名或推舉解，「荐」作頻仍、屢次解，此大正藏與磧砂藏同。僅發生一次差異。）

Marks variations that appear in compounds ("Morphological variance") 詞法不同（辭彙上的差異）- 難以判斷。 Different characters used in compunds Taisho vs. Qisha (vide 服膺/伏膺 宿植/宿殖 杖錫/仗錫 隸習/肄習 有宋/大宋 皈戒/歸戒 縉紳/搢紳 朝廷/朝庭 文采/文彩 叛換/叛渙 察慧/察惠 旃檀/栴檀 玻瓈/玻/玻璃 籍沒/藉沒 杼思/抒思 秉性/受性 苒苒/冉冉 警悟/警寤 修鍊/修練/修煉 剽略/剽掠 踐阼/踐祚 支那/脂那 于闐/于遁 迦濕密羅/迦濕蜜羅 苾芻/苾蒭 輻輳/輻湊)
Marks single character variations. 通用字。
e.g. Mistakes only in the Zhonghua shuju edition 例如僅發生於中華本之錯誤者

encodingDesc.p: 文本中之人名、地名或日期，若於《大正藏》中之參校用字較正確，則從參校用字。
Wherever we can, within a name or date, identify a mistake in the main text of the Taisho canon and a better reading is available in the apparatus, the character from the apparatus is used.
